components.content: What makes this app different from other such apps are its numerous features and many specialties.

Easy to use, easy to scale. That's not all though. It is so much more than just the interface of a simple drawing program; it could do everything you'd expect in an image editing application (especially if they came with some support for landscape orientation).
Icon packs A huge collection can be found within one menu bar without opening them again!
There will always-be at least four icons available even wher
